title: It's Settled: Hereâ€™s the TRUE Fascistic Party | 8/30/22
description:
Glenn and Stu expose the New York Times and some of its questionable ties. The Kamala Harris-backed Freedom Fund has a lousy track record of bailing out repeat offenders. Stu uses the textbook definition of "fascism" to prove which political side is more fascistic. Over 100 pastors have sworn they will never shut down their churches again, using Acts 5:29 as their biblical basis. Glenn and Stu discuss the timeline to fight back against President Biden's loan forgiveness, which disproportionally helps government workers. An old Trump clip about Germany's eventual reliance on Russian energy has been proven accurate. Glenn and Stu discuss former President Trump's claim that the Hunter Biden laptop suppression was election interference.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
